item.title: GRAB
item.description: score:1102 Chances: Grab Holdings’ upcoming announcement of its unaudited second quarter 2023 results and conference call could provide insights into the company’s financial performance and strategic outlook. Strategic reorganization and job cuts by Grab Holdings aim to manage costs, achieve affordability, and adapt to the evolving business environment.
